mapper.insert: insert into Chatroom (chatId, boardId, lendy, lender, chatDate) values(#{chatId},#{boardId},#{lendy},#{lender},#{chatDate})
mapper.select:
select chatId from chatRoom
lendy=#{lendy} and lender=#{lender} and boardId=${boardId}

select m2.`to` as `to`, m2.`from` as `from`, m2.chatId as chatId,m2.content as content, m2.sendTime as sendTime,m2.isRead as isRead, b.boardId from ( select m.chatId,max(m.sendTime) as maxSendTime from message as m group by m.chatId ) as m1 inner JOIN message m2 on m1.chatId=m2.chatId and m1.maxSendTime=m2.sendTime inner join chatroom c on c.chatId=m2.chatId inner join board b on c.boardId=b.boardId where `from`=#{userId} or `to`=#{userid};
mapper.insert: insert into Message (latitude, longitude, chatId, `from`, `to`, sendTime, content) values(#{latitude},#{longitude},#{chatId},#{from},#{to},#{sendTime},#{content})
mapper.select:
select chatId, `from`, `to`, sendTime, latitude, longitude, messageId from message
chatId = #{chatId} and latitude is not null
ORDER BY sendTime asc LIMIT 1
